revised_title: Identification and Properties of Oxalurate of Ammonia in Human Urine
tldr: The author investigates the presence of oxalurate of ammonia in human urine and its properties. They discover that oxaluric acid can be found in urine and explain its formation through the decomposition of urea and oxaluric acid. This finding helps to understand the formation of oxalate of lime deposits in urine.
